BERLIN-A political impasse may cause irreparable harm to the German research system , if it is n't solved soon , the heads of three German science organizations warned today .
BERLIN-A political impasse may cause irreparable harm to the German research system , if it is n't solved soon , the heads of three German science organizations warned today .

Politicians need to start making some important decisions in the weeks ahead , according to the rare joint statement by Peter Strohschneider of the German Research Foundation , Horst Hippler of the German Rectors ' Conference , and Wolfgang Marquardt of the German Council of Science and Humanities .
